com.selesse.jxlint.actions

Class LintRuleInformationDisplayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.selesse.jxlint.actions.LintRuleInformationDisplayer

  • public class LintRuleInformationDisplayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is knowledgeable about LintRules. The corresponding static methods print out their knowledge, and exit the program using ProgramExitter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LintRuleInformationDisplayer()

      List all of the LintRules, in summary form:

    • Constructor Detail

      • LintRuleInformationDisplayer

        public LintRuleInformationDisplayer()

    • Method Detail

      • listRules

        public static void listRules()
        List all of the LintRules, in summary form: 
             "Lint Rule 1" : This rule looks at source code.
     "Lint Rule 2" : This rule looks at source code comments.

      • showRules

        public static void showRules(ProgramOptions programOptions)
        List the LintRules, in detailed form. Uses LintRule.getDetailedOutput() to print individual rules.

      • printMarkdownRuleReport

        public static void printMarkdownRuleReport(ProgramSettings settings)
